Issues.Title: App crashes when resources are loaded from *.xaml file rather than BAML
Issues.Body:
* .NET Core Version: (e.g. 3.0 Preview1, or daily build number, use `dotnet --info`): **3.1+**
* Windows version: (`winver`): **21H2**
* Does the bug reproduce also in WPF for .NET Framework 4.8?: **Yes**
* Is this bug related specifically to tooling in Visual Studio (e.g. XAML Designer, Code editing, etc...)? https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/t/VS-Designer-WPF-ComboBox-template-proble/10131279
* Security issues and bugs should be reported privately, learn more via our [responsible disclosure guidelines](https://github.com/dotnet/wpf/blob/main/README.md#reporting-security-issues-and-security-bugs).

 1. Open and build attached project.
 2. Run application.
 3. Click once on each of two buttons. Order does not matter.
**Expected**: app does not crash
**Actual**: app crashes
**Note**: app repros VS XAML designer. If you open MainWindow.xaml and uncomment everything you will see error squiggles.

[WpfApp4.zip](https://github.com/dotnet/wpf/files/9447568/WpfApp4.zip)

**Exception**
System.Windows.Markup.XamlParseException: "'Cannot set unknown member 'System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.IsReadOnly'.' Line number '21' and line position '46'."

Issues.Title: Modified templates to use Implicit Usings
Issues.Body:
Fixes # <!-- Issue Number --> #5790 

Main PR <!-- Link to PR if any that fixed this in the main branch. -->

## Description

<!-- Give a brief summary of the issue and how the pull request is fixing it. -->
Modified templates to support Implicit Usings for .NET 6 and later versions.


## Customer Impact
Developers creating new WPF applications will get Implicit Usings C# feature enabled by default.
<!-- What is the impact to customers of not taking this fix? -->

## Regression
No
<!-- Is this fixing a problem that was introduced in the most recent release, ie., fixing a regression? -->

## Testing
Testing in progress. Installed and built the modified templates for different framework versions.
<!-- What kind of testing has been done with the fix. -->

## Risk
None
<!-- Please assess the risk of taking this fix. Provide details backing up your assessment. -->

Issues.Title: window auto close
Issues.Body:
i  have a wpf app,  used signalr to commucation ; when i opend more then  20 ,and runing  a few minutes  later ,some client aotu closed,
i have got nothing error,only vs2022 ouput window have some info: application “[44024] CarClient.exe” has exited ,return value 3221225477 (0xc0000005) 'Access violation'。

my system is  win10 64, i am  used vs2022 and .net 6.0.
i am changed the wpf  to winform or maui form ,the  problem still there
help！！！！！！
